targets.expression:
fields concat( @log, " [ ", StatusCode, " ]") as Status
| filter ispresent(StatusCode)
| filter StatusCode >= 400 and StatusCode < 500
| filter StatusCode != 404

fields @timestamp, concat( @log, " [ ", Version, " ]") as ServiceVersion
| filter ispresent(Version)
| filter toMillis(@timestamp) >= toMillis(datefloor(@timestamp, 5m))

fields concat( @log, " [ ", StatusCode, " ]") as Status
| filter ispresent(StatusCode)
| filter StatusCode >= 500

fields @timestamp, @message, StatusCode
| filter ispresent(StatusCode)
| stats count() as Hits by bin(1m), StatusCode

panels.description: The number of active sessions for the database
panels.title: DB Load
Approximate Number Of Messages in DLQ
